special_abilities.name: Roleplaying Information.
descriptions: Beldora is a member of the harpers who survives using her wits and wiles. She looks like a homeless waif, but she's a survivor who shies away from material wealth.
Ideal: "We should all strive to help one another"
Bond: "I'll risk my life to protect the powerless."
Flaw: "I like lying to people. Makes life more interesting, no?"

actions.name: Shortsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage, .

actions.name: Hand Crossbow.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. Beldora carries ten crossbow bolts.

actions.name: Duck and Cover.
descriptions: Beldora adds 2 to her AC against on melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Duvessa must see the attacker and can't be grappled or restrained.
